flawed_nl_solution:
Tyler gives away 21 / 3 = <<21/3=7>>7 CDs
After giving away a third of his CDs, Tyler has 21 - 7 = <<21-7=19>>19 CDs
After buying new CDs, Tyler has 19 + 8 = <<19+8=27>>27 CDs

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 14.0, not 19.0. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
